ARABIC: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except to those who come to Allah with sound and flawless hearts.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But to him who comes to God with a tranquil heart."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but only he that brings to Allah a sound heart will (attain to success)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except what is done in obedience to God with a submissive heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Except he who presented himself before Allah, with a sound* heart.” (Intact or unblemished.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except him who brings to Allah a clean heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except him who comes to Allah with a heart free (from evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: except for him who comes to God with a pure heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save him who bringeth unto Allah a whole heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when he alone will be saved who comes to God with a sound heart."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unless it be he, who shall bring unto Allah a whole heart,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except him who comes to Allah with a sound heart,’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But only he (will prosper) that brings to Allah a sound heart;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except him who brings to Allah a clean heart [clean from Shirk (polytheism) and Nifaq (hypocrisy)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except him who comes before Allah with a pure heart;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for him who comes to God with a sound heart.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:89] except him who comes to God with a heart that is sound, [free] from idolatry and hypocrisy — and this is the heart of the believer, whom such [things] will avail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Save him who bringeth unto Allah a whole heart) a heart free of sins and love for this worldly life; it is also said that this means: a heart free of hatred for the Companions of the Prophet (pbuh).
